de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt

Class CliOptionsImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt.CliOptionsImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CliOptions

    public final class CliOptionsImplementation
extends Object
implements CliOptions
    Holds the given command line arguments. Implementation for Apache Commons CLI and JComander.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
